85310.「お集まりの 皆さまぁ～っ！\n 今から アストルティア・ナイト コンテストに\:
Ladies and gentlemen! From now on, I'd like to
introduce you to the handsome men who will be
participating in the Astartia Knight Contest!

85311.「ウェナ諸島が誇る クール・ガイ！\n 時折 見せる やさしさで\n 女ゴコロを:
The pride of the Wena Islands, the Cool Guy!
He is the pride of the Wena Islands, the Cool
Guy!

85312.「ワルぶってても 子ネコは助けちゃう！\n 無頼のイケメン剣士～っ ヒューザ！:
He may be a badass, but he'll save a kitten!
The handsome and trustworthy Swordsman Hyuza!

85313.「ふん……。参加するつもりはなかったが\n 頼まれたから 仕方なく来てやったんだ:
Hmm... I wasn't going to participate, but you
asked me to, so I had no choice but to come.

85314.「過去からやって来た 美形すぎるプクリポ！\n 悲劇の英雄は ナイトとなって\n:
The beautiful Pukulipo from the past! Will the
tragic hero become a Knight and change the
future of Astoltia?

85315.「銀の丘には 今日も\n 出待ちのファンが つめかけてるぜ～っ！\n 永遠をさす:
Silver Hill is packed with Fan Fans waiting
for you today! Wandering travelers of
eternity~ Fostail!

85316.「……これから始まるのは 争いじゃない。\n 甘い夢のような宴の ちょっとした余:
...what's about to begin is not a fight. It's
just a little entertainment for your sweet
dreams. Come on, you're in for a treat...

85317.「ドデカい図体に つぶらな瞳ぃ！\n すべてを受け容れる 純粋すぎる心！\n そ:
A big figure with dull eyes! A heart too pure
to accept anything! Yes...here he comes~!

85318.「ピュア・ピュア・ハートの 頼れる男！\n 博愛のパラディン～っ ズーボー！:
A man with a pure, pure heart! Paladin of
benevolence~! Zubo!

85319.「オイラ 応援してくれる みんなのために\n せいいっぱい がんばるのだ！\n:
I'll do my best for everyone who supports me!
Nooooo! I'll be a Knight!

85320.「コイツのハートを射止めれば\n まさか まさかの 玉の輿ぃ～！？:
If you win this guy's heart, you'll get the
ball rolling, no way!

85321.「小さな肩に背負った 父母の想い！\n 涙をこらえて 今日も がんばっちゃう\n:
The love of my parents on my small shoulders!
I'm fighting back tears and doing my best
today, the heir to Megistris... Raguas!

85322.「みなさん……ぼくは まだ若輩者ですが\n 父と 母に誓って ベストを尽くします:
Gentlemen...I know I'm still a young man, but
I swear to my father and mother that I will do
my best!

85323.「チャラく見えても ハートはアツいじぇ～！\n 必殺パンチと 時々見せる マジな:
He may look like a player, but his heart is still hot! His special punches and the serious profile he sometimes shows will win the hearts
of all the girls!

85324.「拳の道を極めし 最強の武闘家とは\n この男のことだぁ～っ！\n 新世代 超天:
The Strongest Man who has mastered the way of
the fist is this man~! A new generation of
Heavenly Warrior Yarn!

85325.「お～っ！ みんな 強そうなヤツだな～。\n だが 超天道士たる者 負けは許され:
Oh~! You all look so strong! But as a Choutei,
I can't lose. I will be the Knight!

85326.「……ええ～っ！？\n こ この オジサンも参加すんのぉ！？\n なんで よりに:
What? This old man is participating too? Why
of all people...

85327.「もきぃーっ！ ぶぎ ぶぎぃーっ！！\n なんですっ！？ このキラキラした城はっ:
Mooie! Buggy, buggy! What is it! This
sparkling castle! It's beyond horrifying!

85328.「いいですかっ！ わしは 総選挙に出ますッ！\n だから わしなんかに投票しねえ:
Listen up! I'm running in the general
election! So don't vote for me! I'll hate you
for the rest of my life if you vote for me!

85329.「つーことで！ 今の 参加者は\n ガラクタ城の城主ぅ～ 奇人ダストン！！\n:
So! The participant now is Junk Castle's Junk Castle's Junk Castle's Junk Castle's Junk Castle's Lord Duston! That's right! Let's have
a round of applause!

85330.「さぁ～て！ 気をとりなおして……: Let's see! Let's get back on track...

85331.「この先は お待ちかねェイ！\n レンダーシアからの 参戦者たちが\n 華麗に:
And now, we've got a surprise for you! The
entrants from Lendersia are making their grand
entrance!

85332.「その 妖しい瞳を 見つめたら\n 誰ひとり 逆らえない！？\n 正体不明の ミ:
Once you gaze into those bewitching eyes, no
one will be able to resist! The unknown Mr.
Mysterious!

85333.「まずはぁ～ やっぱり このヒトっ！\n 謎の水先案内人～っ クロウズ！:
First of all~ I knew it! The mysterious
pilot~! Claws!

85334.「皆さん……私は どうしても\n アストルティア・ナイトに ならなくては\n な:
Ladies and gentlemen, I must become an
Astartian Knight. So...

85335.「……いえ こんな手段を 使うまでもない。\n 皆さんの熱い視線をみれば\n 私:
No, I don't need to resort to such means. I'm
sure I'll win, judging from the passionate
looks you've all given me...

85336.「ちっちゃなボディに ミラクルパワー！\n 伝説の英雄は ここでも\n 新たなる:
Miracle power in a tiny body! Will the
legendary hero create a new legend here as
well?

85337.「メルサンディ村が誇る ダイナマイトヒーロー！\n 小さな英雄ぅ～っ ザンクロー:
The pride of Melsandy Village, the dynamite
hero! Little Hero Zankrone!

85339.「さあ 始めようか……お嬢さんがた。\n 燃え上がれ！ ハートが焦げない程度にッ:
Let's begin... ladies. Burn up! Not to burn
your hearts out!

85340.「その瞳に宿るは 愛か復讐か！？\n ちょー☆カリスマまもの使いは\n 女ゴコロ:
In those eyes, is it love or vengeance? The
charismatic Monster Master may be able to
manipulate women's hearts as well~?

85341.「アラハギーロ王国を 統べる \n ハードボイルド・ダンディ！\n デンジャラス:
Hard-boiled dandy, ruler of the Kingdom of
Al-Ahagiro! Dangerous King Bermud!

85342.「……もはや 我が心にあるのは\n 愛した魔物たちへの 鎮魂の祈りのみ……。:
I no longer have anything in my heart but
repose in the repose of the souls of the
monsters I have loved.

85343.「ヤツらへの たむけに……\n この勝利を捧げたいのだ……。\n 諸君！ 我に:
I would like to dedicate this victory to their
reminder... gentlemen! Vote for me.

85344.「さぁ～て！\n いよいよ 最後の参加者の登場だぁ～っ！！:
Let's go! Now it's time for the last
participant!

85345.「未来を守るために戦った はかなき王子！\n お兄ちゃん・オブ・ジ・イヤーは\n:
The fragile prince who fought to protect the
future! Will the big brother of the year also
get the title of Knight!

85346.「伝説の影に埋もれた 栄光なき勇者！\n グランゼドーラ王子ぃ～っ トーマ！:
Hero without glory, buried in the shadow of
legend! Prince Gran Zedora~! Toma!

85347.「もはや この身では\n グランゼドーラのために 何もできない。:
I can no longer do anything for Gran Zedora in
this body.

85348.「だが アストルティア・ナイトとなり\n せめて 勝利の栄冠を\n 我が民と 妹:
But I want to be an Astartian Knight and at
least bring the crown of victory back to my
people and to my sister...

85349.「以上っ！ １０名の\n イケメンと そうじゃないのが\n ナイトの座をかけ コ:
That's it! Ten hot guys and ten not-so-hot
guys will be competing for the title of
Knight!

85350.「栄光の座に かがやくのは 誰か……\n それを決めるのは！\n こ・こ・に・い:
Who will be crowned with glory... will be
decided! It's going to be you, right here,
right now!

85351.「さ～て どう？ どう？ <pc>。\n ちょーイケメンが 大集合だけど\n 正:
Well, what do you think? <pc>. There
are so many handsome guys here, but honestly,
who do you think is your favorite?

85352.「アストルティア・ナイトに ふさわしいと思う\n イケメンを選んだら\n その人:
Once you've chosen the right Astartia Knight,
you must help him collect cookies!

85353.「キミが クッキー集めを手伝った相手に\n １票が入るからねっ！\n よ～く 考:
Whoever you help collect the cookies gets my
vote! So think very carefully before you
choose!

85354.「選び終わったら 話すことがあるから\n メリルの所に 来るべし！\n 外で待っ:
When you're done picking out your choices,
come on over to Merrill's and we'll talk about
it! I'll be waiting outside, I promise!

85795.「ただし！ 勝つのは……オレだぜ？: But! I'm the one who wins, okay?

86185.「じゃじゃーん！\n アストルティア・ナイト コンテストの\n 結果発表を 始め:
Ta-da! I'm going to start announcing the
results of the Astartia Knight Contest!

86186.「さあさあ！ ホワイトショコラ城の\n ナイトの座は 誰の手に！？\n 耳の穴か:
Come on, come on! Who will be the Knight of
White Chocolate Castle? Listen to me with your
ears open!

86187.「いっくよ～！\n みんなっ ステージに 注目するべし～っ！！:
Let's go! Everyone, pay attention to the
stage!
